channel.title: After i use magic i must wait 15-20 seconds
channel.description:
can someone help me with this.. i like pking its just i cant use magic much its a 15-20 seconds wait ive tryed to find it in client.java and i found nothing
so can someone help me please!?

dunno what the errors are, I just copied the Spell and added a timer

item.title: After i use magic i must wait 15-20 seconds
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

[quote=“AD LVL 7, post:11, topic:129505”]first the actiontimer has to countdown in the boolean (ok for most sources)
then make the Spell like this:

if(magicID == 12891 && actionTimer <= 0) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; startAnimation(1979); highalch(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0, Lockon); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); actionTimer = 10; sendMessage("You poison the enemy!"); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }
just add the timer next to the spellID[/quote]

thanks for these error’s

location: class client if(magicID == 12891 && actionTimer <= 0) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) ^ client.java:28400: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyY2 location: class client highalch(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0, Lockon); ^ client.java:28400: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyX2 location: class client highalch(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0, Lockon); ^ client.java:28402: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcIndex location: class client server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: After i use magic i must wait 15-20 seconds
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

first the actiontimer has to countdown in the boolean (ok for most sources)
then make the Spell like this:

if(magicID == 12891 && actionTimer <= 0) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; startAnimation(1979); highalch(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0, Lockon); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); actionTimer = 10; sendMessage("You poison the enemy!"); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }
just add the timer next to the spellID

Read full topic

item.source: After i use magic i must wait 15-20 seconds

item.title: After i use magic i must wait 15-20 seconds
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Try

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 94)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4); 
deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;  
startAnimation(1979);
highalch(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0, Lockon);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 1;
sendMessage("You poison the enemy!");
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
}
}

Read full topic
